item.title: RWX Fast Failover
item.description: Related issues https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn/issues/6205 LEP https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn/pull/9069 Test Failover with I/O Given Longhorn cluster with 3 worker nodes. And Enable the feature by setting rwx-enable-fast-failover to true. Ensure that setting auto-delete-pod-when-volume-detached-unexpectedly is set to its default value of true. And Deploy an RWX volume with default storage class. Run an app pod with the RWX volume on each worker node. Execute the command in each app pod `( exec 7<>/data/testfile-${i}; flock -x 7; while date | dd conv=fsync >&7 ; do sleep 1; done )` where ${i} is the node number.
